name: Nyric
title: NYRIC by Lovelace Studio
shortDescription: Welcome to Nyric, a generative AI open world sandbox. Craft, build, and explore completely unique worlds that are procedurally spawned at runtime based on your prompt!
description: Welcome to the very first Nyric alpha - a genAI open world sandbox! As an exclusive early player, you can craft, build, and explore procedurally spawned worlds based on your prompt! LLM-generated quests help you grow immersive stories. When youâ€™re done you can submit them back to the space and the story summary and metadata will be minted as your very own NFT! We are listening! Let's build this platform together by sharing your creative feedback. The inspiration we get from dedicated builders will help inform our feature prioritization so be sure to keep checking back as we regularly update the platform! Join our shared vision to help you build epic stories!
